description.en: The course consists of Spanish phonetics and text analysis. The text analysis is focused on developing reading skills. The phonetics course consists of two parts: practical pronunciation exercises and the theoretical part which includes the description of Spanish phonetical system (the characteristics of vowels and consonants) as well as an introduction to phonetic transcription.
description.et:
Kursus koosneb kahest osaainest: hispaania keele foneetikast ja tekstianalüüsist. Tekstianalüüsis arendatakse hispaaniakeelse kirjaliku teksti mõistmise oskust.
Foneetika osaaine sisaldab praktilist (kuulamine, häälduspraktika) ja teoreetilist osa (foneetika põhimõisted, hispaania keele häälikusüsteem, foneetiline transkriptsioon).

objectives.en: The purpose of the course is to acquire Spanish pronunciation and to learn to understand simple written texts.
objectives.et: Omandada hispaania keele häälduspõhimõtted ja alusteadmised foneetikast ning arendada kirjaliku teksti mõistmise oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en:
After passing the course the students:
TEXT ANALYSIS:
1) can read and understand simple written texts in Spanish;
2) has acquired basic strategies for written text comprehension.
PHONETICS:
1) know the rules of Spanish pronunciation and orthography;
2) are acquainted with the basics of phonetics and phonetic transcription.
